text: Buttons is a 1927 American silent drama film directed by George W. Hill and written by Marian Constance Blackton, Ralph Spence, and Hayden Talbot. The film stars Jackie Coogan, Lars Hanson, Gertrude Olmstead, Paul Hurst, and Roy D'Arcy. The film was released on December 24, 1927, by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. It is one of the few Jackie Coogan films to be considered a lost film.The Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog: Buttons ==Cast== ==References== ==External links== * * *Jackie Coogan in Buttons (1927), stills from the collection of director George W.
